description: Information specific to a donor that is a human (Homo sapiens).
title: Human-specific
name: human_specific

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

body_mass_index.description: The body mass index of the donor.

ethnicity.guidelines: Enter one or more ethnicities, separated by a comma.

ethnicity_question.description: Question and response options posed to donors for collecting metadata on donor self-reported ethnicity and / or tribe and / or dialect group and / or race etc.
ethnicity_question.example: What is your ethnicity?; Are you Hispanic/Latino?; Which categories describe you? Select all that apply. Note You may select more than one group. American Indian or Alaska Native (for example, Aztec, Blackfeet Tribe, Mayan, Navajo Nation, Native Village of Barrow (Utqiagvik) Inupiat Traditional Government, Nome Eskimo Community, etc.)* Asian (for example, Asian Indian, Chinese, Filipino, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, etc.)* Black, African American, or African (for example, African American, Ethiopian, Haitian, Jamaican, Nigerian, Somali, etc.)* Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish (for example, Columbian, Cuban, Dominican, Mexican or Mexican American, Puerto Rican, Salvadoran, etc.)* Middle Eastern or North African (for example, Algerian, Egyptian, Iranian, Lebanese, Moroccan, Syrian, etc.)* Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander (for example, Chamorro, Fijian, Marshallese, Native Hawaiian, Tongan, etc.)* White (for example, English, European, French, German, Irish, Italian, Polish, etc.)* None of these fully describe me (optional free text answer) Prefer not to answer

ethnicity_parents.guidelines: Enter one or more ethnicities, separated by a comma.

primary_language.description: Primary language(s), spoken by donor. Can include dialects (for example, Hokkien).

mother_father_language.description: Ancestral language(s), spoken by parents (“mother tongue” and / or “father tongue”) and / or grandparents. Can include dialects (for example, Hokkien).

current_residence_location_country.description: Country and state of donor's current residence at time of sample collection.
current_residence_location_country.example: Singapore; United Kingdom; Massachusetts USA; New South Wales Australia; Nassau Bahamas
current_residence_location_country.guidelines: Enter the country and state if available.

current_residence_location_granular.description: Nearest city, town, or village to location of donor's current residence at time of sample collection.

current_residence_duration.description: Duration of residence, in years, rounded up to the nearest whole number, at time of sample collection.
current_residence_duration.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

current_residence_urbanrural.description: Urban, suburban, or rural descriptor of current residence.
current_residence_urbanrural.guidelines: Should be one of: urban; suburban; rural

place_of_birth_location_country.description: Country and state of place of birth.
place_of_birth_location_country.example: Singapore; United Kingdom; Massachusetts USA; New South Wales Australia; Nassau Bahamas
place_of_birth_location_country.guidelines: Enter the country and state if available.

place_of_birth_location_granular.description: Nearest city, town, or village to location of place of birth.

place_of_birth_duration.description: Duration of residence, in years, rounded up to the nearest whole number.
place_of_birth_duration.guidelines: Enter either a single value or a range of values. Indicate a range using a hyphen.

place_of_birth_urbanrural.description: Urban, suburban, or rural descriptor of place of birth.
place_of_birth_urbanrural.user_friendly: Area type of place of birth
place_of_birth_urbanrural.guidelines: Should be one of: urban; suburban; rural
